text: Peter Krieger (30 November 1929 – 1981) was a German footballer who played for 1. FC Saarbrücken and the Saarland national team as a forward. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:1981 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:1. FC Saarbrücken players Category:Association football forwards Category:People from Göppingen (district) Category:Footballers from Baden- Württemberg
title: Peter Krieger
